vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) then, now, so
1a) (who) then, (what) then (with interrog)
1b) then (with imperative-i.e. know then)
1c) if...then (with adv)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (與疑問代名詞或副詞連用) 那麼....
2) (命令或希求) 那麼....
3) 如果....然後, 若不....那麼
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (与疑问代名词或副词连用) 那么....
2) (命令或希求) 那么....
3) 如果....然后, 若不....那么
